mapper.insert: INSERT INTO detail (name, gender, price, department_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{gender}, #{price}, #{departmentId})
mapper.update: UPDATE detail SET name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, price = #{price}, department_id = #{departmentId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, is_active AS isActive, gender, price, department_id AS departmentId FROM detail
